attributes.action: Ensure MP's salary and expenses are decided by an independent non-parliamentary body, out of the control of MP's themselves
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As representatives of the British people, MP's should not have any additional power to influence their own pay and conditions, above that of a normal British citizen. An independent body should be established with responsibility for analysing and monitoring salaries and working conditions across the entire economy. MP's salary and expenses should be decided based on the recommendations of this independent body, not the MP's themselves.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
